Description:
About the RoleWe are looking for a team of strong Business Development Representative to drive our business forward at this exciting time. Reporting into the Global Head of Business Development Representatives, youâ€™ll work closely with the other BDRs, Account Executives and the broader Sales Operations team to increase Business. You will achieve this through acquiring new private & public sector customers.About the jobAs a Business Development Representative, you will be instrumental in customer acquisition for Business within the market.What you'll doBe responsible for generating revenue pipeline through outbound prospecting (cold calls/emails)
Build territory plans based on geography, industry, size etc.
Identify new business opportunities, prospect the right decision makers within a business.
You will be responsible for scheduling a Discovery Calls to qualify the prospect in/out using BANT, and schedule a follow up call/meeting for the Account Executives.
Meet or exceed all assigned activity and pipeline creation targets.
Bring an innovative approach to prospecting and acquisition, with a customer-oriented mindset.
Work with the Account Executives and Sales Managers within your region to develop and iterate on a prioritization model, operational infrastructure, and internal tools and processes.
Communicate effectively and efficiently via phone, email, video conferencing and in-person meetings.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree or equivalent
Minimum 12 months of B2B sales/business development experience is required.
A history of consistently exceeding KPIs and activity targets.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to obtain the necessary information from the prospect, while also ensuring a mutually beneficial conversation.
To be driven and excited about a fast-paced team environment.
Excellent organization, project management and time management skills, and ability to take initiative.
Advanced proficiency in Arabic and English.
Salesforce is a plus!
